% !! Uncomment the following line for a camera ready build (or)                !! %
% !! Comment out the following line for a development build                    !! %

% \def\isinternal{0}\def\isextended{1}\def\ishidename{0}

% !! Do not touch any file that is named `<thing>_AUTOGEN.tex`                 !! %
% !! These files are automatically generated from `tex_autogen/<thing>.tex`    !! %
% !! To regenerate them:                                                       !! %
% !!   1. Download the project to a computer that has Make and LaTeX installed !! %
% !!   2. Run `make` from the command line at the root of the project          !! %
% !!   3. Upload the new generated files to Overleaf                           !! %
% !! Note: (1) and (3) are easy to automate with Overleaf's git integration    !! %
% !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! %

%%%%%%%%%
% FLAGS %
%%%%%%%%%

% 1. Is this an internal version?  (i.e., not public-facing.)
% 2. Is this an extended version?  (e.g., includes appendix.)
% 3. Should authors be anonymized? (e.g., submitted for blind peer review.)

\ifdefined \isinternal \else \def \isinternal{1} \fi
\ifdefined \isextended \else \def \isextended{1} \fi
\ifdefined \ishidename \else \def \ishidename{0} \fi

% Defaults can be overridden from the Makefile
\newif \ifinternal \if \isinternal 1 \internaltrue \else \internalfalse \fi
\newif \ifextended \if \isextended 1 \extendedtrue \else \extendedfalse \fi
\newif \ifhidename \if \ishidename 1 \hidenametrue \else \hidenamefalse \fi

\def\isemulateword{0} % used by `darais/defaults.tex` and `darais/imports.tex`

% DOCUMENT %
%%%%%%%%%%%%

\documentclass[12pt]{article}
